text: Bar qavmi Samud ʙarodarason Soleh (alajhissalom)-ro firistodem. Guft: «Ej qavmi man, Allohro ʙiparasted, sumoro cuz U hec ma'ʙudi ʙarhaq nest. Az coniʙi Alloh ʙaroi sumo nisonae oskor omad. In modasuturi Alloh ʙarojaton nisonaest. Rahojas kuned, to dar zamini Alloh ʙicarad va hec oseʙe ʙa u narasoned, ki azoʙe dardovar sumoro faro xohad girift
